alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 7:51AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Phillips County through 830 AM CDT... At 751 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glade, or near Phillipsburg, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Phillipsburg around 800 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Agra. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for north central Kansas.
